senses.sense_definition: The action of bending or falling over loosely, or a part of something that hangs down.

examples.text: The heavy rain caused a <w>flopover</w> of the tall flowers in the garden.
He tried to style the <w>flopover</w> of hair that kept falling into his eyes.

senses.sense_definition: A sudden change from one position, opinion, or allegiance to another.

examples.text: There was a sudden <w>flopover</w> in the committee's decision regarding the new policy.
Analysts predicted a <w>flopover</w> in voter sentiment just weeks before the election.

senses.sense_definition: A form of television signal distortion where the displayed image appears to scroll vertically rather than remain still.

examples.text: We need to adjust the vertical hold knob to stop the picture <w>flopover</w>.
The old screen suffers from constant <w>flopover</w>, making it impossible to watch the show.
